Title: Esma's Secret - Grbavica
Actors: Mirjana Karanovic, Luna Zimic Mijovic, Leon Lucev, Kenan Catic
Plot: Set against the backdrop of a former Yugoslavia of the nineteen-nineties, this is a single mother's anguish of how one must deal with truths and how to cope with a war's terrible past. With a twelve year old daughter to bring-up, both mother and child come head-to-head when a school trip is in the air and complications and rude awakenings arise from the ashes' of the cold and callous days of conflict, xenophobia and its secrets.
Country: Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Austria, Germany
